actions.text: On agreeing to the Etheridge amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A009) offered by Mr. Etheridge.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Etheridge amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole

description: Amendment clarifies that borrower services, including delinquency prevention, default aversion, and loan counseling, are allowed uses of grant funds. The amendment also explicitly authorizes the Department of Education to contract directly with guaranty agencies for funded services.
purpose: An amendment numbered 9 printed in House Report 111-256 to clarify that borrower services, including delinquency prevention, default aversion, and loan counseling, are allowed uses of grant funds. The amendment also explicitly authorizes the Department of Education to contract directly with guaranty agencies for funded services.
